Неплохое разнообразие для cs 1.6 от разработчиков. Набираешь себе команду из разных игроков, которые отличаются друг от друга по скиллу, храбрости и командной сыгранности (насколько я понял). Потом проходишь с этой командой миссии и в конце, в зависимости от сложности заданий получаешь медальку. Мне понравилось, пару часиков поиграть можно)

Remember the time when the internet was in it's infancy, and you had to have all  your friends meet in one place and have a LAN party? This game will bring back those memories! Heck, just go ahead and have an old fashion LAN party! I have been playing this game off and on for nearly 20 years, its still just as entertaining!

This game is more valuable for playing single player with bots than other Counter-Strike games. Not as popular as the other CS but it is worth to play if you are creative enough to make enjoyable Tour of Duty. The Delete Scenes is not great because it has mediocore gameplay with frustating checkpoints (sometimes, you died 1 second after respawn from last checkpoint due to attacked by chopper), but the features for the latter are decently interactive.

Кто-то ещё помнит об этой игре?

Counter-Strike: Condition Zero is quite hated by the Counter Strike community, and I can understand why. The game was released just a small time before Half Life 2 and proved to be way behind its time. However, comparing it to the original 1.6 one, this game is a nice improvement. Much better graphics and sounds, bugs fixed, better maps and a decent buy menu, I would definetly play this over 1.6. However, even if you have no internet, you can always play the campaign, which has challenging and fun missions, with interesting bots AI and a lot of different great maps, competitive-quality. Even though the game is pratically dead, there are still some nice servers running on it, so you should definetly check it out.
Rate: 17/20
